rm(list=ls())
library(dplyr); library(stringr); library(ggplot2); library(plotly); library(lubridate); library(readr); library(colorspace); library(grDevices); library(shiny); library(shinyjs); library(scales);library(rio)

#### 資料處理
  
```{r data cleaning, echo=TRUE, eval=T}
## 資料讀入
ufoFromFb <- read.table("ufoFromFb.csv", encoding = "utf-8", header = TRUE, sep = ",")


## 資料整理

graphData <- list()
str_replace_all(ufoFromFb$timestamp,"/","-")-> ufoFromFb$timestamp

# FB cleaning

ufoFromFb %>%
  slice(-c(63:71)) -> ufoFromFb_tm


ufoFromFb_tm %>%
  slice(c(1:16)) %>%
  mutate(
    Date = str_sub(timestamp,1,9),
    when = str_sub(timestamp,11,12)
  ) -> ufoFromFb_tm_1

ufoFromFb_tm %>%
  slice(c(17:62)) %>%
  mutate(
    Date = str_sub(timestamp,1,10),
    when = str_sub(timestamp,12,13)
  ) -> ufoFromFb_tm_2

rbind(ufoFromFb_tm_1,ufoFromFb_tm_2) -> ufoFromFb_tm
as.numeric(ufoFromFb_tm$when) -> ufoFromFb_tm$when
ymd(as.factor(ufoFromFb_tm$Date)) -> ufoFromFb_tm$Date


graphData$ufoFromFb_tm <- ufoFromFb_tm


```



```{r graph, echo=T, eval=T}

ufoFromFb_tm$Date -> tm0
as.numeric(ufoFromFb_tm$when) -> ufoFromFb_tm$when
ufoFromFb_tm$when -> tm1
max(tm1) -> yend




graphData$ufoFromFb_tm %>%
  ggplot()+
  geom_rect(
            aes(
    xmin = ymd("2019-11-3"),
    xmax = ymd("2019-11-8"),
    ymin = 0,
    ymax = yend),
    fill = "#FFE4B5",
    alpha = 0.02 
  )+
  geom_rect(
            aes(
    xmin = ymd("2019-11-18"),
    xmax = ymd("2019-11-27"),
    ymin = 0,
    ymax = yend),
    fill = "#FFE4B5",
    alpha = 0.02 
  )+
  geom_rect(
            aes(
    xmin = ymd("2019-12-16"),
    xmax = ymd("2019-12-17"),
    ymin = 0,
    ymax = yend),
    fill = "#FFE4B5",
    alpha = 0.02 
  )+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 12,
             linetype = "longdash",
             size = 0.8,
             alpha = 0.5,
             color = "black"
  )+
  geom_point(aes(x= Date,
                y= when,
                group = 1,colour = event.title)
    )+
  scale_y_discrete(
    limits = c(tm1),
    breaks = c("6","12","18","24"),
    labels = c("6","12","18","24")
  )+
  scale_color_discrete(name="活動名稱")+
  theme(
    axis.title = element_blank(),
    axis.line = element_line(color = "black", size = 0.8),
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(), 
    axis.text.y = element_text(margin = margin(t = 0, r = 6, b = 0, l = 0, unit = "pt")),
    plot.margin = margin(t = 0, r = 0, b = 0, l = 15, unit = "pt"),
    legend.position = "none",
    ) -> ufoFromFb_tm_graph


ufoFromFb_tm_graph
save(ufoFromFb_tm_graph,yend, file="ufoFromFb_tm_graph.rda")




```
